Package game.actions

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    ActivateAction
    The ActivateAction class represents an action to activate a lost grace.
    AreaAttackAction
    The AreaAttackAction class represents an action that allows an Actor to perform an area attack on all surrounding Actors in a given GameMap.
    AttackAction
    An Action to attack another Actor.
    ConsumeAction
    The ConsumeAction class represents an action where an actor consumes a consumable object.
    DeathAction
    An action executed if an actor is killed.
    DespawnAction
    A class that represents the action of despawning an actor from a game map.
    DropRuneAction
    The DropRuneAction class represents an action where a player drops a rune at their previous location.
    ExchangeItemToWeaponAction
    The ExchangeItemToWeaponAction class represents an action where an actor exchanges an item with a weapon.
    PurchaseAction
    Action for a player to purchase a weapon from a trader.
    QuickStepAction
    Action for quick step.
    RecoverRuneAction
    Action to allow an actor to pick up previously dropped runes.
    RestAction
    Represents an action where an actor rests at a site of lost grace.
    SellAction
    Action to sell weapons from trader to an actor.
    SummonAction
    The SummonAction class represents an action that allows an actor to summon allies or invaders in a game.
    TeleportAction
    The TeleportAction class represents an action that allows the player to teleport to different locations.
    UnsheatheAction
    An action for unsheathe action.
